subject: Colleges and Universities
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: Kansas State filed a lawsuit challenging a secret deal between the former athletic director Bob Krause and the ex-football coach Ron Prince that would pay Prince $3.2 million in deferred compensation between 2015 and 2020. Prince’s agent responded that the lawsuit was without merit and the deal between his client and the university was legally binding.
